name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnipSolve AI - Screenshot questions & solve with GPT-4 Vision

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenshot questions or select the text, and get it solved with GPT-4 Vision. Free using your own API Key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot question or select text - and get it solved with AI GPT-4, without leaving your tab.
Simplest way to help you on your quizzes, practice problems, take-home assignments, and more!

Features:
1. Snip / Screenshot & Ask
Snip your question and ask it to the latest OpenAI vision model - GPT 4 Vision.
SnipSolve will guide you on how to tackle the problem and give you the answer

2. Select text & Ask
Highlight the text of the problem > Right Click > Ask Snipsolve AI

You can use for free with your own OpenAI API Key.
